-- | This function guesses the pixel format from the number of channels:
--   
--   <ul>
--   <li>1 ~&gt; Alpha</li>

--   <li>4 ~&gt; RGBA</li>
--   </ul>
--   
--   For more control, use <a>makeTextureFromBitmap</a>.
